Package helper

Class AppointmentQuery

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentQuery
public abstract class AppointmentQuery extends Object
This class creates methods for querying the appointments table in the database.

    • selectTopCustomer

      public static int selectTopCustomer() throws SQLException
      The method for querying the appointments table in the database ordered by count of customer ID occurrences. The method orders and sorts the table by counting the number of times a customer ID occurs.
      Returns:
      The ID of the customer with the most appointment occurrences.
      Throws:
      SQLException
